title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 2 of the NBA Finals. Should Draymond have been assessed a 2nd technical foul and thrown out of the game? Plus, Grant Hill checks in to discuss his new memoir, including topics like his injuries and relationship with Coach K.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Game 2 of the NBA Finals. Should Draymond have been assessed a 2nd technical foul and thrown out of the game? Plus, Grant Hill checks in to discuss his new memoir, including topics like his injuries and relationship with Coach K.
